p: The interim ethics committee comprising the following members of the Ministry of Health; Mr. George Taleo the Director General of Health, Mr. Len Tarivonda the Director of Public Health, Mr. Russel Tamata the Director of Hospital and Curative Health and Dr. Posikai Samuel Tapo the Director of Cooperative Services, Planning and Policy approved the study. All adults provided verbal consent either for themselves or for their children to be included in the study.
